name: Skillz Pool: 3D Billiards
description:
Welcome to Skill Shot Pool. Compete in head-to-head matches for fun, for cash, or for both! Withdraw your cash prizes at any time via Paypal, Apple Pay or Credit Card.

Start by practicing for free virtual z-Bucks. Learn quickly how to rack up your score with bank shots, potting balls in order, trick shots and by running the table with speed. Made a mistake? Undo your last shot! Need more power? Try the power-shot gadget. Feeling lucky? Spin the pockets for a higher multiplier. All players can use each gadget only three times, so use them tactically.

Then go pro and compete in Skillz powered cash competitions, leagues and tournaments to win some hard cash!

You will always be matched with players on the same skill-level as you to guarantee fair-play in every match.

Training matches and tournaments are always free. Play as long as you want, whenever you want. You never have to wait for an opponent.

KEY FEATURES:

* Easy to learn yet deep Pool Billiards multiplayer action
* Intuitive and precise controls
* Realistic physics simulation with forward spin, back spin, side and swerve shots
* Extra score for bank shots, trick shots, potting balls in order, distance shots, and speed
* Make clever use of your gadgets: Undo last shot, Pocket-Spin, Power-Shot
* Compete in games for cash and prizes
* Unlimited play without energy, timers, loot boxes or pay-to-win
* Play in online-tournaments against player of your skill-level from around the world
* Earn Trophies and claim great prizes
* Collect Tickets and turn them into cash or prizes
* Play your way up the leaderboard and win guaranteed cash prizes.

Do you have what it takes to become a professional Skill Shot Pool player?

Get the game and find out today!

Please note: Cash tournaments are available in most of the world. Cash tournaments are not enabled in the following states: AZ, AR, CT, DE, IL, IN, LA, ME, MT, SC, SD, and TN. If you don’t live in a prize-enabled region, you can still play for free.
